name: PHI-CL
title: Phidias Collection
author: PHIDIAS0303
description:
UPS-friendly megabases
Compound entities to save space and UPS
Adjusted pipe limits for smoother logistics

Space Age Enhanced
Supports spoilage and quality mechanics
Two modes: Vanilla+ (refined classic) or Space Age+ (easier planetary challenges)

Multiplayer Maps
Regular PHI-CL VP or SAP games hosted on APERX
https://wiki.aperx.org/en/home
